dict.acceptation: 以畏缩的方式去做，失去勇气；在最后一刻因胆怯而退出了；

sent.orig: Chicken Anemia Virus (CAV) is the pathogen of Chicken Infectious Anemia (CIA).
sent.trans: 鸡贫血病毒(chicken anemia virus,CAV)是鸡传染性贫血病(chicken infectiousanemia,CIA)的病原体。

sent.orig: Come on. Don't be a chicken. It's perfectly safe and it'll be a lot of fun.
sent.trans: Achicken?Chicken是鸡的意思。我不想去爬岩石，这和鸡有什么关系？

sent.orig: Top listed ingredients: Chicken Broth, Chicken, Chicken Giblets, Chicken Liver, Lamb Liver, Mackerel and Rice.
sent.trans: 首要成分为：鸡汤，鸡肉，鸡残余物（估计就是鸡杂），鸡肝脏，羊肝脏，鲭鱼和米麸质。

sent.orig: Boil chicken time, same, the chicken breast cooked, chicken thigh, boil not.
sent.trans: 煮鸡时间，同样，鸡胸肉煮熟了，鸡大腿，就煮不。

sent.orig: Whole chicken, a chicken, 4 a chicken of, Whet the lousy ginger juice.
sent.trans: 全鸡，半个鸡，4份之一鸡肉，磨烂生姜汁。
